params.name: client
params.description: The client used to access this user.

params.name: data
params.description: Raw object data of the user.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetch the user in Battlelog and refresh his data with the raw data Battlelog gave.

methods.name: structureData
methods.description: Structure the class using the data provided.

params.name: data
params.description: The data used to structure the class

methods.name: displayAvatarURL
methods.description: Get the URL string of the user's avatar.

returns.description: URL string for the user's avatar.
